cmake -G Ninja .. -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE="C:/Program Files (x86)/Android/AndroidNDK/android-ndk-r27c/build/cmake/android.toolchain.cmake" -DASSIMP_ANDROID_JNIIOSYSTEM=ON -DASSIMP_FORCE_32BIT_FILEIO=ON -DASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_IMPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT=ON -DCMAKE_CXX_STANDARD=17 -DANDROID_STL=c++_shared -DANDROID_PLATFORM=android-21 -DANDROID_ABI=arm64-v8a -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="-fexceptions -frtti" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release  -DCMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS="-lc++_shared"

ninja
